thread.title: A more intimate, upscale way to cruise Europe's rivers
thread.title_full: A more intimate, upscale way to cruise Europe's rivers

author: senh
title: A more intimate, upscale way to cruise Europe's rivers
text: BING NEWS: Latest cruise-ship comforts offer ultimate in berth control These snappy features are more typical of a five-star hotel, but Tauck’s recently launched 130-passenger MS Inspire is a contemporary river vessel claiming some of the largest, smartest and best-equipped cabins plying Europe’s inland waterways. 02/20/2015 - 2:00 pm | View Link What to Eat and Buy at Europe's Christmas Markets on the Danube I recently returned from a Viking River Cruise along the Danube that stopped at five of the most famous Christmas markets in Europe ... Nearby, the more intimate Lucreziamarkt has more upscale hand-made goods, including ceramic salt cellars and blown ... 12/16/2014 - 8:34 am | View Link Regent Seven Seas shocks industry with $3 billion sale to Norwegian Cruise Line Innovative, but hardy as upscale as RSSC or Oceania ... resort style cruise vacation on some of the newest and most contemporary ships at sea.” The line was named "Europe’s Leading Cruise Line" for the seventh consecutive year, as well as "Caribbean ... 09/2/2014 - 9:27 am | View Link Europe River Cruise Forecast for 2015 From the Danube to the Seine, from the Rhone/Saone to the Elbe and the Rhine, Europe’s waterways beckon past tour clients and ocean cruisers—not to mention repeat river cruisers—eager for a hassle-free, intimate ... selling river cruises, and we ... 08/17/2014 - 9:00 pm | View Link River cruises offer ‘a whole new way’ of seeing Europe It was also an indication, said Yaptangco, of Asia’s growing importance as a market for such upscale tours.
